body_html:
I haven't been able to repro locally, but I'd be curious if a heap dump might help isolate the problem or identify a leak.

If possible, you might try 1) Call inferenceInterface.close(), 2) Force a GC, 3) capture a heap dump. From there I'd be happy to look at the dump to see if anything stands out.

body:
I haven't been able to repro locally, but I'd be curious if a heap dump might help isolate the problem or identify a leak.

If possible, you might try 1) Call `inferenceInterface.close()`, 2) Force a GC, 3) capture a heap dump. From there I'd be happy to look at the dump to see if anything stands out.
